3: A group of disorderly Program Ghosts are attacking one another, blocking your way.
The Program Ghosts that fought us before are killing one another now...
We can't move forth with them blocking our way, and we've still got more Program Ghosts behind us...
Guess we'll have to force our way through here...
That's the only logical thing to do now. We can't afford to waste time here.
This is it! We've broken our way through!
Working together, the four of you make it past the Program Ghosts and arrive at a safer location.
Who knows if we'll need to fight again up ahead, but we have no choice except to keep moving.
'Bianca' is most likely... just right up ahead.
Let's go. Brace yourself. I've got a feeling that it's not going to be the smoothest ride.
